name: Klaviering
description:
A tiny musical walking sim.

Explore a set of moving traversable sculptures based on 9 piano-based musical loops. Activating certain sculptures will disable the paths to others, based on which loops are musically compatible. There is no ending - you can explore different combinations by resetting the level (Esc -> Reset Level).

Controls:

  • Mouse = Look
  • WASD = Move
  • Space = Jump
  • Left Shift = Run
  • Esc = Options Menu

Music made with bitKlavier https://bitklavier.com/

Made using First Person Drifter for Unity http://www.torahhorse.com/index.php/portfolio/first-person-drifter-for-unity/
